main_definition: A person who plans or creates a design, typically in the fields of fashion, architecture, product development, etc.

meanings_and_examples.example: Alexander McQueen is renowned as a fashion designer known for his avant-garde designs.
Jane Doe transformed the living room with her exceptional interior design skills, creating an inviting and stylish space.
John Smith crafted a striking logo for XYZ Corporation as a graphic designer using Adobe Illustrator.
The renowned architect Zaha Hadid designed the stunning Heydar Aliyev Center in Azerbaijan, blending art and architecture.
As a product designer at Apple Inc., Jane Doe played a key role in creating ergonomic and aesthetic designs for the iPhone X.
